CREATE PROCEDURE make_payment
(
  invoice_id INT,
  payment_amount DECIMAL(9, 2),    -- decimalå¸¦å°æ•°ç‚¹çš„æ•°ï¼Œå‚æ•°1è¡¨ç¤ºæ€»çš„æ•°å­—ä½æ•°ï¼Œå‚æ•°2è¡¨ç¤ºä¿ç•™å°æ•°ä½
  payment_date DATE
)
BEGIN
  IF payment_amount <= 0 THEN
    SIGNAL SQLSTATE '22003'
    SET MESSAGE_TEXT = 'Invalid payment amount.';
  END IF;
  
  UPDATE invoices i
  SET 
    i.payment_total = payment_amount,
    i.payment_date = payment_date
  WHERE i.invoice_id = invoice_id;
END

1

CALL PROCEDURE make_payment(2, -100, '2019-01-01')

22003æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ ‡å‡†ä»£ç ï¼Œä»£è¡¨ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°å€¼ç±»å‹æ•°æ®è¶…å‡ºäº†èŒƒå›´ã€‚ğŸ‘‰ibm-sqlstate

è¾“å‡ºå‚æ•°

CREATE PROCEDURE get_invoices_for_client
(
  client_id INT,  -- é»˜è®¤æ˜¯è¾“å…¥å‚æ•°
  OUT invoice_count INT,
  OUT invoices_total DECIMAL(9, 2)  -- æ€»ä½æ•°æœ€å¤šä¸º9ï¼Œä¿ç•™ä¸¤ä½å°æ•°
)
BEGIN
  SELECT COUNT(*),SUM(invoice_total)
  INTO invoices_count, invoices_total
  FROM invoices i
  WHERE i.client_id = client_id AND payment_total = 0;
END

ä½¿ç”¨è¾“å‡ºå‚æ•°è¯»å–æ•°æ®æœ‰ç‚¹å¤æ‚ï¼Œä¸æ¨èä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

å˜é‡

SET @invoices_total = 0

CREATE PROCEDURE get_risk_factor
BEGIN
  DECLARE risk_factor DECIMAL(9, 2) DEFAULT 0;
  DECLARE invoices_count INT;
  DECLARE invoices_total DECIMAL(9, 2);
  
  SELECT COUNT(*), SUM(invoice_total)
  INTO invoices_count, invoices_total
  FROM invoices;
  
  SET risk_factor = invoices_total / invoices_count * 5;
  SELECT risk_factor;
END

CREATE FUNCTION get_risk_for_client
(
  client_id INT
)
RETURN INTEGER
READ SQL DATA  -- ä»æ•°æ®åº“è¯»å–æ•°æ®;  MODIFES SQL DATAä¿®æ”¹æ•°æ®
BEGIN
  DECLARE risk_factor DECIMAL(9, 2) DEFAULT 0;
  DECLARE invoices_count INT;
  DECLARE invoices_total DECIMAL(9, 2);
  
  SELECT COUNT(*), SUM(invoice_total)
  INTO invoices_count, invoices_total
  FROM invoices i
  WHERE i.client_id = client_id;
  
  SET risk_factor = invoices_total / invoices_count * 5;
  RETURN IFNULL(risk_factor, 0);
END

SELECT client_id, name, get_risk_for_client(client_id) AS risk_factor FROM client;

CREATE PROCEDURE get_clients_by_city(country CHAR(2))
BEGIN
  IF country IS NULL THEN
    SET country = 'CH';
  END IF;

  SELECT * FROM clients c 
  WHERE c.country = country;
END

CREATE PROCEDURE get_clients_by_city(country CHAR(2))
BEGIN
  IF country IS NULL THEN
    SELECT * FROM clients;
  ELSE
    SELECT * FROM clients c 
    WHERE c.country = country;
  END IF; 
END

 9
10
11

CREATE PROCEDURE get_payments
(
  client_id INT,
  payment_method_id TINYINT
  -- 0-255
)
BEGIN
  SELECT * FROM payments p 
    WHERE p.client_id = IFNULL(client_id, p.client_id) AND
    p.payment_method = IFNULL(payment_method, p.payment_method);
END

var sqlMap = {
    // ç”¨æˆ·
    user: {
        add: 'insert into user(id, username, password) values (0, ?, ?)',
        select_name: 'SELECT * from user where username = ?',    //æŸ¥è¯¢ username

    },
    // æ‹›è˜
    hire: {
        add: 'insert into hire(hire_id, title, money, degree, exp, site, time, addr) values (0, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)',
        getAll: 'SELECT * from hire',
        search: 'select * from hire where title = ?',
        update: 'update hire set title = ? where hire_id = ?'
    }
}

module.exports = sqlMap;

// hireUpi.js
var models = require('../db');
var express = require('express');
var router = express.Router();
var mysql = require('mysql');
var $sql = require('../sqlMap');
// è¿æ¥æ•°æ®åº“
var conn = mysql.createConnection(models.mysql);
conn.connect();
var jsonWrite = function(res, ret) {
  if (typeof ret === 'undefined') {
    res.send('err')
  } else {
    //res.json(ret);
    res.send('ok')
  }
};

// å¢åŠ 
router.post('/addList', (req, res) => {
  var sql = $sql.hire.add
  var params = req.body
  conn.query(sql, [params.title, params.money, params.degree, params.exp, params.site, params.time, params.addr], function (err, result) {
    if (err) {
      console.log(err)
    }
    if (result) {
      jsonWrite(res, result)
    }
  })
})

// æ›´æ–°
router.post('/updateList', (req, res) => {
  var sql = $sql.hire.update
  var params = req.body
  conn.query(sql, [params.title, params.hire_id], function (err, result) {
    if (err) {
      console.log(err)
    }
    if (result) {
      jsonWrite(res, result)
    }
  })
})

//æŸ¥æ‰¾
router.get('/searchList', (req, res) => {
  var sql = $sql.hire.search
  var params = req.query
  console.log(params)
  conn.query(sql, [params.title], function (err, result) {
    if (err) {
      console.log(err)
    }
    if (result) {
      console.log(result)
      res.send(result)
    }
  })
})

// è·å–æ‰€æœ‰list
router.get('/getAllList', (req, res) => {
  var sql = $sql.hire.getAll
  var params = req.query
  conn.query(sql, function(err, result) {
    if (err) {
      console.log(err)
    }
    if (result) {
      console.log(result)
      res.send(result)
    }
  })
})

// åˆ é™¤
router.post('/delList', (req, res) => {
  var sql = $sql.hire.del
  var params = req.body
  conn.query(sql, [params.hire_id], function (err, result) {
    if (err) {
      console.log(err)
    }
    if (result) {
      jsonWrite(res, result)
    }
  })
})


module.exports = router;

<el-form-item>

<!--ç¼–è¾‘ç•Œé¢-->
<el-dialog :visible.sync="dialogFormVisible" @click="dialogFormVisible=false">
  <el-form label-width="80px" :model="editForm">
    <el-form-item label="å²—ä½åç§°" prop="title">
      <el-input v-model="editForm.title" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥å²—ä½å"></el-input>
    </el-form-item>
    <div slot="footer" class="dialog-footer">
      <el-button @click.native="dialogFormVisible=false">å–æ¶ˆ</el-button>
      <el-button v-if="dialogStatus=='create'" type="primary" @click="addList">æ·»åŠ </el-button>
      <el-button v-else type="primary" @click="updateList">ä¿®æ”¹</el-button>
    </div>
  </el-form>
</el-dialog>
// ...
<script>
methods: {
  handleAdd: function() {
    this.dialogFormVisible = true;
    // æ–°å¢æ—¶æ¸…ç©º
    this.editForm = {
      title: ''
    }
  },
  // æ·»åŠ 
  addList() {
    var title = this.editForm.title
    axios.post('/api/hire/addList', {
      title: title
    }).then(function(response) {
      alert('æˆåŠŸå½•å…¥' + title + '')
      this.dialogFormVisible = false
    }).catch(function(error) {
      console.log(error)
    })
  },
  // æ›´æ”¹
  updateList() {
    var title = this.editForm.title
    var hire_id = this.editForm.hire_id
    axios.post('/api/hire/updateList', {
      title: title,
      hire_id: hire_id
    }).then(function(response) {
      alert('æˆåŠŸæ›´æ–°' + title + '')
      this.dialogFormVisible = false
    }).catch(function(error) {
      console.log(error)
    })
  }
}
</script>
